org.openimaj.stream.provider

Class WikipediaEditsDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.util.stream.AbstractStream<T>
      • org.openimaj.util.stream.BlockingDroppingBufferedStream<T>
        • org.openimaj.stream.provider.irc.AbstractIRCStreamDataset<WikipediaEditsDataset.WikipediaEdit>
          • org.openimaj.stream.provider.WikipediaEditsDataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<WikipediaEditsDataset.WikipediaEdit>, Iterator<WikipediaEditsDataset.WikipediaEdit>, Dataset<WikipediaEditsDataset.WikipediaEdit>, StreamingDataset<WikipediaEditsDataset.WikipediaEdit>, Stream<WikipediaEditsDataset.WikipediaEdit>

    public class WikipediaEditsDataset
extends AbstractIRCStreamDataset<WikipediaEditsDataset.WikipediaEdit>
    Streaming dataset based on the Wikipedia/Wikimedia edits published in real-time on the wikimedia IRC channels.
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

        Construct the edit stream with the given buffer and language.
        Parameters:
        buffer - the buffer
        language - the language id; currently only English "en" is supported
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem connecting
